summary: The client requested to start Sprint 7, which was acknowledged and initiated by PM Sarah, directing the team to proceed with implementing planned backlog stories and report any scope adjustments.

decisions.title: Initiate Sprint 7
decisions.details: Sprint 7 officially starts as per client request, with team instructed to implement backlog stories.

actions.task: Implement planned stories from the backlog
Report any needed adjustments to sprint scope to PM Sarah
